title: China to vigorously make sci-tech innovations to foster new growth drivers: Xi
content:
Photo taken on Nov. 17, 2020 shows the Long March-5 Y5 rocket at the Wenchang Spacecraft Launch Site in south China's Hainan Province.  (Xinhua/Guo Cheng)
BEIJING, Nov. 19 (Xinhua) -- Chinese President Xi Jinping said Thursday that China will vigorously make scientific and technological innovations to foster new growth drivers.
